trans-unit.source: Known Networks
trans-unit.target: Known Networks

trans-unit.source: By configuring known networks, you can avoid having IP addresses that are owned by your organization included in the Sign ins from multiple geographies and Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity reports.
trans-unit.target: By configuring known networks, you can avoid having IP addresses that are owned by your organization included in the Sign ins from multiple geographies and Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity reports.

trans-unit.source: Known Networks
trans-unit.target: Known Networks

trans-unit.source: You can use Azure Active Directory's access and usage reports to gain visibility into the integrity and security of your organization’s directory.
trans-unit.target: You can use Azure Active Directory's access and usage reports to gain visibility into the integrity and security of your organization’s directory.

trans-unit.source: With this information, a directory admin can better determine where possible security risks may lie so that they can adequately plan to mitigate those risks.
trans-unit.target: With this information, a directory admin can better determine where possible security risks may lie so that they can adequately plan to mitigate those risks.

trans-unit.source: It is possible that the “Sign ins from multiple geographies” and “Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity” reports incorrectly flag IP addresses that are actually owned by your organization.
trans-unit.target: It is possible that the “Sign ins from multiple geographies” and “Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity” reports incorrectly flag IP addresses that are actually owned by your organization.

trans-unit.source: This can, for example, happen when:
trans-unit.target: This can, for example, happen when:

trans-unit.source: A user in your Boston office has signed in remotely to your data center in San Francisco triggers the “Sign ins from multiple geographies” report
trans-unit.target: A user in your Boston office has signed in remotely to your data center in San Francisco triggers the “Sign ins from multiple geographies” report

trans-unit.source: A user of your organization tries to sign-on several times with an incorrect password triggers the “Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity” report
trans-unit.target: A user of your organization tries to sign-on several times with an incorrect password triggers the “Sign ins from IP addresses with suspicious activity” report

trans-unit.source: To prevent these cases from generating misleading security reports, you should add known IP address ranges to the list of your organization's public IP address.
trans-unit.target: To prevent these cases from generating misleading security reports, you should add known IP address ranges to the list of your organization's public IP address.

trans-unit.source: To add your organization’s public IP address ranges, perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: To add your organization’s public IP address ranges, perform the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Sign-on to the <link><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Sign-on to the <link><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In the left pane, click Active Directory. How Cloud App Discovery Works
trans-unit.target: In the left pane, click Active Directory. How Cloud App Discovery Works

trans-unit.source: In the Directory tab, select your directory.
trans-unit.target: In the Directory tab, select your directory.

trans-unit.source: In the menu on the top, click Configure. How Cloud App Discovery Works
trans-unit.target: In the menu on the top, click Configure. How Cloud App Discovery Works

trans-unit.source: On the Configure tab, go to your organizations public IP address ranges How Cloud App Discovery Works
trans-unit.target: On the Configure tab, go to your organizations public IP address ranges How Cloud App Discovery Works

trans-unit.source: Click Add Known IP Address Ranges.
trans-unit.target: Click Add Known IP Address Ranges.

trans-unit.source: Add your address ranges in the dialog box that appears, and then click the check button when you are done. <html></html><html></html><linkText>How Cloud App Discovery Works</linkText>
trans-unit.target: Add your address ranges in the dialog box that appears, and then click the check button when you are done. <html></html><html></html><linkText>How Cloud App Discovery Works</linkText>
